headline.purpose: Primary hook, must be readable in 1 second

geminiPrompt:
Create a WhatsApp Status image (1080x1920px vertical format):

    DESIGN TYPE: tax_saving_tips
    LAYOUT: checklist

    VISUAL SPECIFICATIONS:
    - Canvas: 1080x1920px, 9:16 aspect ratio
    - Mobile-optimized with thumb-zone awareness
    - High contrast for outdoor viewing
    - 3-second comprehension rule applied

    BRAND IDENTITY:
    - Advisor: Shruti Petkar
    - Primary Color: #1A73E8
    - Secondary Color: #34A853
    - Tagline: Building Wealth, Creating Trust

    FONT HIERARCHY (Mobile Optimized):
    - Headlines: 96px bold (top 20% of screen)
    - Subheadings: 72px semibold
    - Body Text: 56px regular
    - CTAs: 64px bold
    - Footer/Disclaimer: 42px minimum

    CONTENT ELEMENTS:
    {
  "background": {
    "style": "subtle_pattern",
    "baseColor": "#F5F5F5"
  },
  "headline": {
    "text": "Save \u20b946,800 in Taxes!",
    "fontSize": 96,
    "color": "#1A73E8",
    "position": {
      "x": "center",
      "y": 200
    }
  },
  "tips_checklist": {
    "items": [
      "\u2713 ELSS Funds - \u20b91.5 Lakh",
      "\u2713 NPS - \u20b950,000 Extra",
      "\u2713 Health Insurance - \u20b975,000",
      "\u2713 Home Loan - \u20b92 Lakh"
    ],
    "fontSize": 56,
    "position": {
      "x": 100,
      "y": 500
    }
  },
  "deadline_warning": {
    "text": "\u23f0 Only 90 Days Left!",
    "fontSize": 72,
    "color": "#FF5722",
    "position": {
      "x": "center",
      "y": 1100
    }
  },
  "cta": {
    "text": "Plan Your Taxes Now",
    "fontSize": 64,
    "style": "urgent_button",
    "position": {
      "x": "center",
      "y": 1400
    }
  },
  "branding": {
    "advisorName": "Shruti Petkar",
    "tagline": "Your Tax Planning Partner",
    "fontSize": 48,
    "position": {
      "x": "center",
      "y": 1750
    }
  }
}

    STYLE GUIDELINES:
    - Modern, clean, professional
    - Use brand colors prominently
    - Ensure text has proper contrast
    - Include subtle animations/transitions feel
    - Bottom 15% clear for WhatsApp reply bar

    COMPLIANCE:
    - Include disclaimer: "Mutual fund investments are subject to market risks."
    - ARN: ARN_SHRUTI_001

    OUTPUT: High-quality status image optimized for mobile viewing
